video.title: Doki
video.synopsis: Doki's a 7-year-old with a lot of questions about science and nature, and he and his explorer friends travel the globe and beyond to get the answers.

episodes.synopsis: Fico searches for dragons to fight on Komodo Island; when Anabella ruins her mother's scarf, the gang visits Beijing to learn where silk comes from.
episodes.title: Brave Knight Fico / On the Silk Road

episodes.synopsis: Learning to juggle, Doki wonders if he could juggle in space. A rare opportunity blasts the team off to the International Space Station to find out.
episodes.title: Doki in Orbit / A Bit Stretch

episodes.synopsis: Doki masters a climbing wall and decides he's ready to climb Mount Everest; Fico travels to cold Iceland to take a hot bath.
episodes.title: Climb Every Mountain / Fico’s Hot Bath

episodes.synopsis: Oto needs vanilla to make ice cream, so the team seeks out a magical vanilla fountain in Madagascar; Gabi seeks a special flower pot in Canada.
episodes.title: World’s Favorite Flavor / Down By The Bay

episodes.synopsis: Doki and friends go to a balloon festival in Mexico; the team dives deep into the Mediterranean Sea to find out if there's light on the ocean floor.
episodes.title: Ups and Downs / Doki in the Deep

episodes.synopsis: Doki wonders how to get running water in the clubhouse. In Spain, the team discovers how the Romans brought clean water from far away to their city.
episodes.title: Doki’s Pipe Dream / Squeezin’ Cheese

episodes.synopsis: Team Doki arrives in Paris for a bike tour. Arguing over which bike is best, they decide to have a race like the famous Tour de France to find out.
episodes.title: Doki’s Bike Challenge / Doki’s Desert Discovery

episodes.synopsis: Exploring a New York City skyscraper helps the team figure out how to build a sturdier layer cake; the gang goes to see "The Nutcracker" in Moscow.
episodes.title: Sky’s the Limit / The Nutcracker? Sweet!

episodes.synopsis: The gang goes to Lascaux, France, to see ancient cave paintings; Gabi tries to figure out how to keep hungry rabbits out of her garden.
episodes.title: Big Picture / Up on the Roof

episodes.synopsis: When Fico's favorite mug breaks, the team learns about creating pottery in Mexico; the gang learns about rainbows in Victoria Falls, Zimbabwe.
episodes.title: Play with Clay / Chasing Rainbows

episodes.synopsis: When Team Doki plans a spooky party, a Hollywood director shows them that with ordinary items and some imagination, you can create special effects.
episodes.title: Monster Masquerade/ Castles and Monsters

episodes.synopsis: When Oto wants gold for his rock collection, the team visits the Yukon Territory to pan for nuggets, and the boys get lost looking for a mine.
episodes.title: Going for the Gold / Water Woes

episodes.synopsis: The team visits China to see where fireworks were invented; on the way home from China, the gang attends a countdown in London.
episodes.title: Happy Noodle Year / Happy New Year… Again!

episodes.synopsis: The team must move Anabella's massive new sculpture, so they take off to Easter Island, where they learn how simple machines can lighten their load.
episodes.title: Mysterious Moai / Hide and Seek

episodes.synopsis: Team Doki wonders why rushing water crumples the paper boats they race, bringing them to the Panama Canal, where a real boat race is now in order.
episodes.title: Doki’s Canal Race / Fico’s Masterpiece

episodes.synopsis: On Fico's birthday, the gang attends a luau in Hawaii; the friends go to Puerto Rico to find out if falling stars exist.
episodes.title: Aloha Birthday / Catch a Falling Star

episodes.synopsis: To build a team-sized hammock, the group scouts California's redwoods -- the world's biggest trees; the team helps with a concert in Australia.
episodes.title: Treetop Team / A Whale of a Tale

episodes.synopsis: Gabi and Doki visit the U.S. to work as ranch hands in Colorado; Doki wonders if he could fry an egg on the sidewalk in Chimborazo, Ecuador.
episodes.title: Team Tenderfoot / Doki’s Egg Experiment

episodes.synopsis: The team travels to Nunavut, Canada, to learn ways to stay warm in the winter; the friends go on an expedition in Greece.
episodes.title: Deep Freeze Doki / Pentathlon Pranks

episodes.synopsis: The team learns about crabs and bridges on Christmas Island, Australia; the friends go to a kite festival in Japan to help Gabi learn how to fly hers.
episodes.title: Crabby Crossover / City of Kites

episodes.synopsis: The team tours a robot factory in Tokyo; Doki learns that there's a lightning storm every day in the city of Maracaibo, Venezuela.
episodes.title: Robot Rampage / Fixed in a Flash

episodes.synopsis: The team discovers a giant iceberg near Greenland; Oto and the gang stock up on airplane parts at Metro Airport.
episodes.title: North to Doki-land / Runway Runaround

episodes.synopsis: Doki takes the team on a treasure hunt in Egypt. Lost in a pyramid, they discover a cache of antiquities that changes their ideas about "treasure."
episodes.title: The Treasure Hunters / Subway Solution

episodes.synopsis: Doki cannot afford a baseball, so the team heads to a bartering market in Peru; the team heads to England to learn more about light bulbs.
episodes.title: Traders of ‘Taters / Doki’s Bright Idea

episodes.synopsis: Fico mistakenly receives a package from India containing a talking mynah bird, who leads the team to Bollywood to reunite him with his owner.
episodes.title: Doki and the Dholki / Totora Trouble

episodes.synopsis: The team heads to the Caribbean for a big festival and parade; Doki and friends fly to the state of North Dakota in the U.S. to learn about fossils.
episodes.title: Stuck on Carnival / Fico’s Fossil
